Hello, My name is Sonaxy Mohanty.

I currently hold the position of Senior FP&A Insights Advisor within the Chickasaw Nation. My role involves supporting the Investment Management and Cash Management and Allocation Committee by assessing and examining capital projects/investments.

I have a strong background in Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing and Machine Learning. I specialize in Data Wrangling techniques, Statistical Analysis, and Predictive Modeling. I am well versed with developing Regression models, Decision Trees, Bagging and Boosting algorithms, Time Series Forecasting models, Clustering approach, and more. 

With over 8 years of experience, I am skilled in Python, R, PL/SQL, and Microsoft Power BI. I am currently expanding my skill set to include Quarto and R Shiny.
